title: Bender Over
author: Bender Over
content: Do you drink alcohol? I recently quit and feel great! For me this is related to Bitcoin, since I am much more optimistic about the future, and have some brain left to learn all about blockchains and smart contracts. How about you, are you doing well on most days?

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: I drink although not a drunk but I am still enjoying crypto-currency and Bitcoin specifically, I celebrate with you on giving up on drinking it's a good thing for you it can help you in the ways you feel it can but I don't see how giving up on booze can relate with Bitcoin.I think I would pour me a shot this evening to celebrate your journey, and if you have a personal desire you want to achieve it's alright to do so but just know there are people hitting booze even if it's once in a while and doing well in Crypto-currency

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: That's good for you to stop drinking alcohol but for me, drinking doesn't stop me in doing things related to Bitcoin and it also doesn't mean I enjoy cryptocurrency to earn money just to buy alcohol. As above post explained, there are some people who drink booze when they are doing well in crypto or being successful in crypto for a celebration. As you can see, drinking booze doesn't mean that you won't be successful if you drink booze just don't get drunk.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Research shows that addiction to drugs, buying luxury or expensive brands, smoking, fast food, and alcohol are the biggest money wasters. This is the reason why I am happy for you because when addicted to everything I listed it's hard to quit and you quitting alcohol which literally gives some liberation and participation in something that will help your future is a great achievement.

comments.author: Asuspawer09
comments.body: Quote from: Bender Over on July 19, 2023, 08:58:18 PMDo you drink alcohol? I recently quit and feel great! For me this is related to Bitcoin, since I am much more optimistic about the future, and have some brain left to learn all about blockchains and smart contracts. How about you, are you doing well on most days?Drinking wasn't completely a bad thing I mean as long as you drink responsibly and moderately you should be fine, I drink alcohol sometimes if there are some occasions and I wasn't a big drinker as well and Im good as well as my investment in cryptocurrency. I mean it's a great drink if you're going to celebrate something but if you drink with your friends that was just the best thing, the chitchat was just great with alcohol.I mean as long as you have discipline and really wanted to earn some profits, you're going to start investing, saving, etc. It is just all you want, alcohols are not really that expensive and it wasn't an everyday thing, so as long as you manage your spendings avoid unnecessary wants, I mean just to make sure to not buy something that you can't afford, manage your salary make sure you don't spend over your budget, save a big percentage of your salary. This wasn't a big deal so just, enjoy both drinking and investing at the same time its that easy.

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: Quote from: Bender Over on July 19, 2023, 08:58:18 PMDo you drink alcohol? I recently quit and feel great! For me this is related to Bitcoin, since I am much more optimistic about the future, and have some brain left to learn all about blockchains and smart contracts. How about you, are you doing well on most daysIt's beneficial to ultimately give up alcohol so you can have a clean head but other people find that getting intoxicated inspires them more. I occasionally drink alcohol, but I do so responsibly, therefore it hasn't in any way changed how I live or how I make decisions regarding bitcoin and cryptocurrency. Quote from: alastantiger on July 19, 2023, 10:30:18 PMThis is literally screaming stop doing dumb shit with your money. Rather put it into Bitcoin. Like a popular saying goes, do not waste your money buying trending stuff just to impress those people who you don't like or rather people who do not give a damm about your existence. It's awesome to invest in bitcoin, but if purchasing trendy items brings you the most joy, why not do both at once? After all, everyone has something that makes them happy, that’s why we don't think twice about spending money on things that make us happy. we only get one life to live so let’s spend money on the things that make us happy.

comments.body: This isn't even exclusive to BTC, but to investing and saving money in general. Less or no expenses on vices and useful things = more money for investing and for your savings. Pretty simple.(I think it's reasonable to spend money on booze from time to time, though.)

comments.body: Drinking is fine, one of the most phenomenon Bitcoin holder was drunk I AM HODLING .But yeah drinking surely make you spend more money, similar like you're want to go travelling, smoking, gambling, etc that related about entertain or unnecessary spending. Hence doesn't have to be abused.

comments.body: Good for you, quitting alcohol. I’m sure your liver and wallet are happy. But don’t get too optimistic about Bitcoin. It can be a roller coaster ride of emotions. You might need a drink to cope with the volatility. 😅
